title: 1990 Chevrolet Stepside Truck (for parts)
item_description:
1990 Chevrolet Stepside Truck (for parts)

  • 1990 Chevy Stepside Truck (gutted, for parts only). Must have a trailer for removal.
  • (gutted, for parts only, no smog will be performed by the Seller.**
  • License: 4A32017
  • VIN per Report: 1GCDC14Z5LZ143257
    • Expiration Date: 2/28/2018
    • Registration Suspended 1/12/2018

Note: The Seller sells this vehicle to clean off the property. The last known registered owner is unknown, therefore, a Due Diligent Effort is being completed. Application for Replacement Title, Transfer Form, and Due Diligent Effort for registered owner paperwork will be mailed 2-3 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.** An "as-is" no smog performed by the seller must be signed by the Seller and the Buyer. Buyer agrees to repair and smog vehicle in accordance with DMV if they are to eventually drive vehicle on the road.
